shlokas:
ॐ sah naavavatu । 
sah nau bhunaktu । 
sah veeryan karavaavahai । 
tejasvi naavadheetamastu ma vidvishaavahai । 
om shaantih shaantih shaantih ॥

ॐ Sadashiva Samarambham Shankaracharya Madhyamam ।
    Asmad Acharya Paryantam Vande Guru Paramparam ॥

ॐ   gururbrahma gururvishnurgururdevo maheshvarah । 
guru saakshaat paran brahm tasmai shreegurave namah ॥

ॐ   sarasvati namastubhyan varade kaamaroopini । 
vidyaarambhan karishyaami siddhirbhavatu me sada ॥

ॐ  kaarpanyadoshopahatasvabhaavah  prchchhaami tvaan dharmasammoodhachetaah । 
yachchhreyah syaannishchitan broohi tanme shishyastehan shaadhi maan tvaan prapannam‌ ॥

ॐ vaan me manasi pratishthita । 
mano me vaachi pratishthitam । 
aaviraavirm edhi । 
vedasy ma aaneesthah । 
shrutan me ma prahaaseeh anenaadheetenaahoraatraansandadhaami । 
rtan vadishyaami । 
satyan vadishyaami । 
tanmaamavatu ।
tadvaktaaramavatu ।
avatu maam । 
avatu vaktaaraamavatu vaktaaram । 
om shaantih shaantih shaantih ॥

ॐ bhadran karnebhih shrnuyaam devaah ।
bhadran pashyemaakshabhiryajatraah । 
sthirairangaistushtuvaag‍nsastanoobhih । 
vyashem devahitan yadaayooh । 
svasti na indro vrddhashravaah । 
svasti nah poosha vishvavedaah । 
svasti nastaarkshyo arishtanemih । 
svasti no vrhaspatirdadhaatu । 
om shaantih shaantih shaantih ॥

ॐ ahan vrkshasy reriva । 
keertih prshthan gireriva । 
urdhvapavitro vaajineev svmrtamaasmi । 
dravinan savarchasam । 
sumedha amrtokshitah । 
iti trishadakorvedaanuvaachanam । 
om shaantih shaantih shaantih ॥
